description: The State of Colorado Office of Information Technology (OIT) has adopted version 15 of the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) definitions  related to cloud technology as an operating standard to enhance commonality in communications around cloud-based computing issues.

metadata.description: The State of Colorado Office of Information Technology (OIT) has adopted version 15 of the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) definitions  related to cloud technology as an operating standard to enhance commonality in communications around cloud-based computing issues.

name: OIT Standards - NIST Definition of Cloud Computing
